member.name: IDWriteTextAnalyzer2.CheckTypographicFeature
member.summary: Checks if a typographic feature is available for a glyph or a set of glyphs.
member.param: The font face to read glyph information from.
The script analysis for the script or font to check.
The font feature tag to check.
The number of glyphs to check.
An array of glyph indices to check.
An array of integers that indicate whether or not the font feature applies to each glyph specified.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: IDWriteTextAnalyzer2.GetTypographicFeatures
member.summary: Returns a complete list of OpenType features available for a script or font. If a feature is partially supported, then this method indicates that it is supported.
member.param: The font face to get features from.
The script analysis for the script or font to check.
The maximum number of tags to return.
The actual number of tags returned.
An array of OpenType font feature tags.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.
